channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- Power Management driver
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- Power Management driver

item.title: CVE-2019-6192|2024-09-17T04:20:49.230Z -- lenovo -- power%20management%20driver
item.description: A potential vulnerability has been reported in Lenovo Power Management Driver versions prior to 1.67.17.48 leading to a buffer overflow which could cause a denial of service.
